boardgame.name: Canal Mania
boardgame.description: Canal Mania is a game about the great canal-building era of the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries that captures the feel of the period and gives players plenty of decision making in their attempts to complete some of the most famous British canals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players will engage brilliant engineers such as James Brindley and Thomas Telford in their efforts to create canals linking emerging manufacturing centers, thereby providing the waterways that supplied the goods generated by the Industrial Revolution._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The goal of this game is to have more victory points than your opponents. You gain victory points by building canals (with 0-3 victory point for each hex and 2-8 victory points for the contract) and moving goods through canals (1 for each town you visit, including the first one)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn has 3 phases. In each Phase you can chose one action:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;First Phase:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Take a contract from parliament_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Exchange engineers_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Discard the five face up building cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Second Phase:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Pick up three face up build cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Build tiles_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Third Phase:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Move one good token_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Any Phase Alternative:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;- Draw one card from the top of the build deck_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2007 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: BGTG 71 - Sept. 19, 2007 - SR _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Feedback (Settlers Dice, Canal Mania, Dschungelschatz)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Mint condition. Unused. Payment by cheque or Paypal for UK buyers. Payment by Paypal only for buyers outside the UK. Buyer pays shipping, which normally includes insurance. If you choose not to pay insurance for international shipments, you deduct £3.50 and take the risk. Shipping within the UK is £5. Shipping to Europe is £12. Shipping to the rest of the world is £18. If you are interested in multiple quantities or items, postage is almost certain to come down. Please contact me for details. Tell me where you are so that I can calculate postage to your location. The game will be shipped in an appropriate posting box.
